title: 13 options for throwing out first pitch at a Cubs World Series game
text:
Start Slideshow » Cubs hitting instructor Manny Ramirez has put his support behind Chicago welcoming Sosa back with open arms during the World Series.
The Cubs could stomp another curse and allow Bartman to again lead a normal life by bringing him back for the World Series.
Ronnie "Woo Woo" Vickers has almost become a part of the Cubs just by being a committed fan.
Through the first two home games of the 2015 MLB postseason, the Chicago Cubs have shown that they are looking to do some special things to celebrate the team’s history and beloved fans alongside what many hope is a march to the World Series.
The team has had Ryne Sandberg throw out a first pitch and have shown Ernie Banks and Harry Caray on the new video board in leftfield.
But, who will throw out the first pitch if the Cubs are to make it to the World Series this year? The gallery above provides some suggestions.
